name: Sea-grass Meadows
description: Underwater meadows of sea grass provide habitat for marine life and valuable underwater resources. The marine life and sea grass materials attract fishermen and researchers, while the underwater environment and potential marine threats create constant danger.
atmosphere: Underwater prairies of sea grass sway in ocean currents while diverse marine life finds shelter in the meadows. Schools of fish navigate the underwater landscape as sea grass provides valuable resources. Gentle currents create constant movement. Essential nursery habitat for ocean life.
